name: Far-Out: OST
detailed_description:
Original Game Soundtrack composed by Michael Donner
Track list :

1. Good Morning
2. Full Power Mode
3. Low Power Mode
4. Fire On Board
5. Zero Gravity
6. Ventilation
7. Specimen
8. Last Chance
9. No escape
10. Escape
11. Grand Finale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 - 64 bits
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVIDIA GeForce 9800GTX / ATI Radeon HD 3xxx series
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
